title: Staff Profile Database Schema
description:
Create Staff Management Database Schema

Design and implement a comprehensive database schema for managing healthcare staff members with their credentials, specialties, facility assignments, contact information, and employment status.

Requirements:
- Define staff entity with core fields (ID, name, role, hire date, employment type)
- Add credentials tracking (licenses, certifications, expiration dates, issuing authorities)
- Implement specialties/skills mapping (support multiple specialties per staff member)
- Create facility assignment structure (support multi-facility assignments, primary/secondary designations, effective dates)
- Include comprehensive contact information (email, phone numbers, emergency contact, preferred contact method)
- Add employment status tracking (active, on leave, terminated, suspended, with effective dates and reasons)
- Ensure proper indexing for common query patterns (search by facility, specialty, status)
- Define relationships and foreign key constraints
- Consider audit trail for credential expirations and status changes
- Include validation rules for required fields and data integrity
